short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome Extension that replaces all images with a hilarious Zaboomafoo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension changes all images on all websites to Zaboomafoo, the beloved sifaka lemur. It is the only chrome extension that you will ever need.
